subject: Would .like .to ch.at with you
body:
Hi there lovely,
This kind of opportunity comes ones in a life. I don't want 
to miss ait. Do you? I am coming to your place in few days 
and I though may be we can meet each other. If you don't mind
I can send you my picture. I am a girl.
You can corresbpond with me using my email ubvuz@BounceEmail.info
